meanings.definition: A Spanish dish made with ground meat, tomatoes, and spices.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother makes delicious picadillos for family dinners.
meanings.sent2: I ordered the picadillos at the Spanish restaurant and they were flavorful.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was almost ruined until someone brought out a batch of tasty picadillos.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills are like a well-seasoned picadillos, adding flavor to every gathering.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the simmering picadillos filled the kitchen with warmth and spice.

meanings.definition: A minor fault or flaw in someone's character or behavior.
meanings.sent1: He always forgives his friends for their picadillos.
meanings.sent2: We all have our own picadillos that make us unique.
meanings.sent3: Her habit of leaving shoes everywhere is just one of her picadillos.
meanings.sent4: The picadillos in his personality only added to his charm.
meanings.sent5: Despite his picadillos, he was loved by everyone for his kind heart.
